About Me


Hi, I am Jiasen (Jason) Zheng .
I am currently a student in the M.S. Robotics program at Northwestern University. Before Northwestern, I received my Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering from Union College, where I developed various skills in mechanical design, engineering simulations, and mathematics. I am interested in the Autonomous Vehicle industry, and my projects involve Perception, SLAM, Planning, etc.
